text: 2|140|atalla, ibrahimum isma'ilum, isakhum, ya'akhubum, ya'akhub santatikalumellam tanne yahudarea kraistavarea ayirunnu ennanea ninnal parayunnat‌? (nabiye,) ceadikkuka: ninnalkkanea kututal arivullat ? atea allahuvinea? allahuvinkal ninn labhiccatum, tanre pakkalullatumaya saksyam maraccu veccavanekkal valiya atikramakari arunt ? ninnal pravarttikkunnatine parriyeannum allahu asrad'dhanalla
